channel.title: To play MoparScape, and spawning weapons and stuff, and upping skills?
channel.description:
Ok I have a few questions since I am new to using MoparScape, after wanting to use it ever since I've heard of it...ok...
[b]1. To play MoparScape, do I have to download anything else?[/b]
[b]2. How do I spawn items/characters/monsters?[/b]
[b]3. How updated is the item spawner? (Skillcapes, Godswords, and beyond)[/b]
[b]4. How would I max skills quickly?[/b]
Please help. Thanks.

item.title: To play MoparScape, and spawning weapons and stuff, and upping skills?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Baker Mod Baker
item.description:
@Mod_Baker wrote:

ohh hybridscape, dont know really. Theres the pickup command and thats all i know.

Read full topic

item.title: To play MoparScape, and spawning weapons and stuff, and upping skills?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Baker Mod Baker
item.description:
@Mod_Baker wrote:

All of this is matters about what server youre playing. if you downloaded youre server, just log in. Commands matter with server, like ::pickup 00995 999999 will get you gold.

Read full topic
